justification: Mentions B’s playoff push and deep-threat appeal but ignores B’s consensus-driven mindset, targets/touches focus, and zero-RB tendencies. Trade value is off: swapping Tier 1 RBs while asking for a Tier 4 TE that A doesn’t need (A already has a Tier 3 TE). Hernandez’s friendly playoff schedule likely makes him preferred to Taylor. Rationale is brief and generic; acceptance probability seems inflated.
